title: BlinkIT
description: The BlinkIT-clone-app is a simple frontend clone of the BlinkIt grocery delivery website, built using HTML and CSS. It features a static landing page design without any backend or interactivity, ideal for UI/UX practice or as a basic web design project.

title: Restaurant app
description: A simple  web application for browsing restaurant menus. The app showcases a modern UI with categorized food items, a navigation drawer, and a clean layout ideal for learning web app design using HTML, CSS and Javascript.

title: Spotify-Clone
